column4: sometimes i get these kind of messages: 13:11 -!- Irssi: Couldn't create log file /home/phunbaba/irclogs/FreeNode/zaapiel.log: No  such file or  directory
it's on a remote irssi i log into with ssh
probably the location where you pointed logs to store.. doesn't have FreeNode directory I think
what are the permissions on files
directories are rwx------ and files are rw-------
all directories are drwx------ all files are -rwx------ and they all belong to phunbaba:phunbaba who runs the processes
looking at the structure.. only root has permissions.. where as phunbaba doesn't have permissions
permissions by which the program ran, doesn't have priviliges to edit/touch the file
but the process belongs to phunbaba
then no idea... couldn't help you much
